title: Fear Of Shirk Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Fear Of Shirk Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Fear Of Shirk Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 203
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أُشْرِكَ بِكَ وَأَنَا أَعْلَمُ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِمَا لاَ أَعْلَمُ)).
